name: Dreaming of Mount Fuji
description:
A photography experiment by @fdoganis

Leaving Japan for the first time, I had a glimpse of Mount Fuji from above the clouds and quickly took a picture, minted as "Farewell to Mount Fuji" (hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/185523).
I tried many techniques to enhance the image but it never turned up better than the original.
Inspired by the work of celadoor on hicetnunc, I tried to create an imaginary skyline by using a camera glitch. After many attempts and image processing, Fujisan appeared once more above a sea of clouds.
